name: 10 Seconds Hero (ss0198)
description:
Do you love the sound of a great song, the chills you get when the beat precisely matches your mood? Do you know the feeling that comes deep from your inside, that makes you want to hit those beats at the right moment, maybe dancing, maybe beatboxing or singing along? Do you know that we created a game where you can train your sense of rhythm and feel the overwhelming satisfaction of perfectly hitting the beats?

Go, little soldier, and follow your deepest instincts. Follow your heart and feel the rhythm that comes with our precious game. Merge with your musical side and get your ear candy today! We present you the unique opportunity to test your sense of rhythm and be the star of literal beatboxing. But stay concentrated because the rhythm changes every 10 seconds and always watch out for the boxes you must hit to fully enjoy our game and to make it to the top score.

Controls

  • Mouse: Look around
  • Left Mouse Button: Hit with the hammer
  • A: Move Left
  • D: Move Right
